SubjectCatherine Janeway (no stated gender), DoB Unknown
When For2024-03-01 --> 2024-09-15
Performer Practitioner/flight-surgeon-1

Report Details

CodeValueFlagsWhen For
Galactic Cosmic Radiation Dose450 microsievert (Details: UCUM codeuSv = 'uSv')Final2024-03-15 12:00:00+0000
Radiation dose total180 millisievert (Details: UCUM codemSv = 'mSv')Final2020-01-01 --> 2024-12-31

Astronaut received total mission dose of 85 mSv during 198-day ISS mission. Career dose now 180 mSv, within NASA guidelines. No acute radiation exposure events. Recommend continued monitoring and standard post-flight assessment.

conclusion: Astronaut received total mission dose of 85 mSv during 198-day ISS mission. Career dose now 180 mSv, within NASA guidelines. No acute radiation exposure events. Recommend continued monitoring and standard post-flight assessment.
